pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 1, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Toronto, Ontario

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Tailor Projectâ€™s A Common Thread event in commemoration of Holocaust Remembrance Day, and deliver remarks. Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett and Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Ahmed Hussen will be in attendance.

Holy Blossom Temple
1950 Bathurst Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 p.m., and present themselves to the main entrance of the Holy Blossom Temple, off Bathurst Street, entering through the far right door.
  • Media are asked to register in advance with danielle@ideaworkshop.ca no later than 2:00 p.m. on Wednesday, May 1.
